mapper.sql: select c.case_id, c.case_name, c.module_id, m.module_name, c.case_type, c.case_expect, c.case_step, c.case_level, c.case_preconditions, c.create_by, c.create_time, c.update_by, c.update_time, c.case_num, c.project_id, c.remark, c.img_urls, d.defect_processing_count, d.defect_audit_count, d.defect_close_count from sys_case c LEFT JOIN sys_module m on m.module_id = c.module_id LEFT JOIN ( select case_id, IFNULL(sum(case when defect_state = 0 or defect_state = 3 then 1 end), 0) as defect_processing_count, IFNULL(sum(case when defect_state = 1 then 1 end), 0) as defect_audit_count, IFNULL(sum(case when defect_state = 4 then 1 end), 0) as defect_close_count FROM sys_defect GROUP BY case_id ) d on d.case_id=c.case_id
mapper.select: select IFNULL(MAX(case_num),0) from sys_case where project_id=#{projectId}
select COUNT(case_id) from sys_case where project_id=#{projectId} GROUP BY project_id;

SELECT c.case_id FROM ( SELECT module_id FROM sys_module WHERE module_id = #{moduleId} UNION SELECT t.module_id FROM ( SELECT * FROM sys_module WHERE module_pid > 0 ORDER BY module_pid, module_id ) t, ( SELECT @pid := #{moduleId} ) pd WHERE FIND_IN_SET( t.module_pid, @pid ) > 0 AND @pid := CONCAT( @pid, ',', t.module_id ) ) ids, sys_case c WHERE c.module_id = ids.module_id ORDER BY c.update_time DESC
